page_props.header_expanded: Building on Emory’s commitment to serve humanity

props.header: 2O36 inspires investment in people for the benefit of people, bringing the Emory community together to build on our mission to serve humanity through knowledge.
props.text:
It’s our firm belief that Emory will transform the world to come—contributing to boundary-pushing advancements that will spark change, inspire wonder, and catalyze action.

With an eye on Emory’s bicentennial, 2O36 will spearhead a movement to radically rethink and reshape the future, providing access to transformative and experiential learning environments with world-renowned faculty and groundbreaking research opportunities.

As a community, we have a duty to prepare students for careers with the potential to change hearts, minds, and the world.

Together, we can bring to life an open and promising future.

props.text: When there is an important issue, a tough question, I want them to think, “I wonder what’s going on at Emory? I wonder how they’re solving this? I wonder what research is addressing this question?”
EMORY IS FOCUSING ON THREE CORE AREAS FOR 2O36.

props.title: Student Success
props.body: Our students are our future. Their Emory education and experiences prepare them for a lifelong journey of impact, contribution, and service. In this context, supporting student success means helping them learn to be thinkers and doers, strengthen values, develop skills, learn about teamwork, and prepare them for careers as well as advanced and professional studies. Their success empowers them to contribute to the world around them in valuable and enriching ways. Emory’s top priority is helping students realize their potential, and enabling the citizens of the future to excel.
props.media_alt: Three students walk across the Quad.
props.media_text: Our students are our future. Their Emory education and experiences prepare them for a lifelong journey of impact, contribution, and service.
